name: One Letter Words Trivia Game | Word Play | 15 Questions

questions.text: Let's do the hardest one first! A small, low island composed largely of coral or sand.
Last name of a spiritual advisor to Queen Mary- 'Astrologer to the Queen'
questions.explanation:
D.

	Dee. Born on July 13, 1527, in London, England, John Dee was an 'English alchemist, astrologer, and mathematician who contributed greatly to the revival of interest in mathematics in England.' - Encyclopaedia Britannica
